model.pieces
Interface Piece

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
FlawedKing, GenericPiece
public interface Piece
extends java.lang.Cloneable

A (chess) piece in simplified chess

Method Detail

location

Square location()
The location (square) of this piece

Returns:
the square

canMoveTo

boolean canMoveTo(Position gamePosition,
                  Square square)
Whether this piece can move to a certain square

Parameters:
gamePosition - The game position (mapping of squares to pieces)
square - The square to move to, may be null
Returns:
true if this piece can move to square
Requires:
gamePosition.get(this.location()) == this

validSquares

java.util.Collection<Square> validSquares(Position gamePosition)
The squares this piece can move to

Parameters:
gamePosition - The game position
Returns:
the set of all squares this piece can move to
Ensures:
result is the set of all squares f such that canMoveTo(gamePosition, f)

moveTo

void moveTo(UpdatablePosition gamePosition,
            Square square)
Move to new square in given position

Parameters:
gamePosition - The game position
square - New square
Ensures:
gamePosition.get(this.location()) == this, this.location() == square
Requires:
canMoveTo(gamePosition, square)

type

void type(PieceType type)
Change the type of the piece.

Ensures:

clone

java.lang.Object clone()
Clones this piece.

Returns:
a clone of this piece
Ensures:
result.location() == this.location(), result.type() == this.type(), result.color() == this.color()
